hero.subtitle: Aramco is a leading plastic manufacturing and distribution company in Egypt, providing high-quality plastic products for industrial, commercial, and household use since 2015.

whyChoose.description: Aramco is a trusted industrial leader in plastic manufacturing, combining advanced technology with skilled craftsmanship to deliver durable, high-quality plastic products worldwide.

points.title: Quality You Can Trust

points.title: Innovative Manufacturing

points.title: Customer-Centric Approach

list.title: Expert Team

list.title: Quality Assurance

list.title: Long-term Partnership

hero.title: Leading the Plastic Manufacturing Industry Since 2015
hero.subtitle: Aramco is a leading plastic manufacturing company established in 2015, dedicated to producing high-quality plastic products for industrial and commercial applications worldwide.

story.heading: Our Story
paragraphs: At Aramco, innovation meets precision. Since our founding in 2015, we’ve been committed to providing durable and sustainable plastic products that serve industries across the globe.
With advanced manufacturing facilities and a highly skilled team, Aramco has become a trusted partner for businesses seeking high-performance plastic solutions that meet international standards.
We take pride in our dedication to quality, sustainability, and continuous improvement — shaping a better, more efficient world through advanced plastic manufacturing.

missionVision.heading: Mission & Vision
missionVision.description: Our success is driven by our commitment to excellence and innovation in Aramco .

cards.title: At Aramco Trading & Industry
cards.description: we are dedicated to delivering high-quality masterbatch products with a strong focus on innovation, sustainability, and customer satisfaction. We achieve this by utilizing the latest manufacturing technologies and providing exceptional after-sales support, ensuring long-term value and reliability for our clients across various industries.

cards.title: Sustainable Masterbatch Innovation
cards.description: To become a leading force in delivering innovative and sustainable raw material solutions — particularly in masterbatch — for the plastics industry, contributing to the progress of global industries and the enhancement of quality of life.

profile.heading: Company Profile
profile.description: Aramco was founded to become a leading manufacturer and supplier of high-quality plastic products, serving diverse industries with innovative and sustainable solutions.

features.title: Our Specialization
features.description: We specialize in producing a wide range of plastic products for industrial, commercial, and domestic applications — including pipes, containers, packaging materials, and custom-engineered plastic components.

features.title: Global Partnerships
features.description: Aramco collaborates with trusted global partners and suppliers to ensure the highest quality of raw materials and advanced production technologies.

features.title: Standards Commitment
features.description: We strictly adhere to international manufacturing standards, ensuring every product meets the highest benchmarks of quality, performance, and sustainability.

quality.title: Quality Commitment
quality.description: Aramco is committed to providing premium plastic products that meet international standards, ensuring durability, precision, and complete customer satisfaction.

policy.heading: Management Policy
policy.description: Our commitment to excellence and sustainability drives every stage of our production process.
paragraphs: Aramco is dedicated to manufacturing and supplying world-class plastic products through innovation, precision, and advanced engineering. Our processes cover product design, molding, quality control, and delivery with a strong focus on customer satisfaction.
We comply with all applicable international standards and environmental regulations, ensuring our operations are safe, sustainable, and socially responsible.

Aramco continually enhances its quality and environmental management systems through continuous improvement, employee training, and technological innovation — ensuring our customers receive only the best.

cta.heading: Partner with Aramco
cta.description: Join global clients who trust Aramco for innovative, high-quality plastic manufacturing solutions built to last.

fireAlarm.ctaSubtitle: Don’t wait for a fire emergency — install a reliable alarm system today to safeguard lives and assets.

systems.title: Conventional Fire Alarm Systems
systems.desc: Reliable and cost-effective fire alarm systems ideal for smaller buildings and straightforward applications.

systems.title: Addressable Fire Alarm Systems
systems.desc: Advanced intelligent fire alarm systems providing precise location identification and enhanced control.

systems.title: Wireless Fire Alarm Systems
systems.desc: Flexible wireless fire alarm solutions perfect for heritage buildings and retrofit applications.

detectionTypes.name: Smoke Detectors
detectionTypes.desc: Advanced photoelectric and ionization smoke detection technology

detectionTypes.name: Heat Detectors
detectionTypes.desc: Fixed temperature and rate-of-rise heat detection systems

detectionTypes.name: Flame Detectors
detectionTypes.desc: UV/IR flame detection for rapid fire identification

detectionTypes.name: Gas Detectors
